id: The Actor Who Plays Luke In "The Haunting Of Hill House" Is Hot, That Is All
paragraph:
No spoilers, just thirst.
        Don't worry I'm not going to spoil the show for you.Oliver Jackson-Cohen is such a dreamy, tragic prince. (Also, he’s 6’3”.) He plays Luke in “The Haunting of Hill House.” But never forget he also played the hot scarecrow in “Emerald City.” Real ones know. https://t.co/LjfirM7VgOOne of the scariest parts of The Haunting of Hill House is how hot Luke got when he grew upOliver Jackson-Cohen #HauntingofHillHouseSide note: I want someone to look at me the way Michiel looks at Oliver (or Oliver's pizza).oliver jackson-cohen pick me up like this i’m begging youBuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
